game.name: 生于午夜
game.genres: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Free To Play
game.shortDescription: Born at Midnight is a story-driven, multi-perspective game. 30 years of Hong Kong history, a cold case, four protagonists. Revolving around a old case, as their fragmented memories from near-death experiences finally piece together, you will confront the midnight that changed everyone's fate...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Born at Midnight is a story-driven, multi-perspective game. 30 years of Hong Kong history, a cold case, four protagonists. Revolving around a old case, as their fragmented memories from near-death experiences finally piece together, you will confront the midnight that changed everyone's fate...
